description: I am 65 years old 5' 11" 185 lbs I am a Chinese American who served in the US military. I am retired. I have three kids and they are all finished college with a master's degree and doctoral degree. My Son is a Medical Doctor with a degree of Doctor of Medicine. I used to teach college physics, calculus and electronics. My wife left me(moved out ) 7 years ago to live with her girlfriend. That is a nutshell of me. As you can see, I value education and family life. As for my future, I believe that God will provide and direct me in His ways. I am a very religious person. I believe in Jesus and not ashame to tell you that I am one of His Children. You can talk to me about God. I can befriend with anyone. Age is just a number. True love should not worry about rich or poor. Outer appearance can be changed overnight. Only what is beauty inside is eternal All others are meaningless. Continue to keep your beauty inside.
intent: Fun, Friendship, Romance, Serious Relationship, Marriage
